direct.cameraControl.lockRoll = True
            direct.setFScaleWidgetByCam(1)

            unpickables = [
                "z-guide",
                "y-guide",
                "x-guide",
                "x-disc-geom",
                "x-ring-line",
                "x-post-line",
                "y-disc-geom",
                "y-ring-line",
                "y-post-line",
                "z-disc-geom",
                "z-ring-line",
                "z-post-line",
                "centerLines",
                "majorLines",
                "minorLines",
                "Sphere",]

            for unpickable in unpickables:
                direct.addUnpickable(unpickable)
